analyzed: dhamma paccanīya anuloma tika tika paṭṭhāna pāḷi
sani dassana ttika ajjhatta ttika dvaya

original: Nasanidassanasappaṭigho naajjhatto dhammo anidassanaappaṭighassa ajjhattassa dhammassa
analyzed: na sa nidassana sappaṭighaḥ na ajjhattaḥ dhammaḥ a nidassana appaṭighassa ajjhattassa dhammassa

original: ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Ārammaṇe cha, adhipatiyā cha, purejāte atthiyā avigate cha.
analyzed: ārammaṇa paccayena paccayo saṅkhitte ārammaṇe cha adhipatiyā cha purejāte atthiyā avigate cha

original: Nasanidassanasappaṭigho nabahiddhā dhammo anidassanaappaṭighassa bahiddhā dhammassa
analyzed: na sa nidassana sappaṭighaḥ na bahiddhā dhammaḥ a nidassana appaṭighassa bahiddhā dhammassa

original: ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Ārammaṇe cha, adhipatiyā cha, purejāte atthiyā avigate cha.
analyzed: ārammaṇa paccayena paccayo saṅkhitte ārammaṇe cha adhipatiyā cha purejāte atthiyā avigate cha

original: Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ naajjhattārammaṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca anidassanaappaṭigho ajjhattārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
analyzed: na sanidassana sappaṭigham na ajjhatta ārammaṇam dhammam paṭicca anidassana appaṭighaḥ ajjhatta ārammaṇaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā saṅkhitta hetuyā tīṇi pe avigate tīṇi

original: Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ nabahiddhārammaṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca anidassanaappaṭigho bahiddhārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
analyzed: na sa nidassana sappaṭigham na bahiddhā ārammaṇam dhammam paṭicca anidassana appaṭighaḥ bahiddhā ārammaṇaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā saṅkhitta hetuyā tīṇi pe avigate tīṇi

original: (Sahajātavārampi paccayavārampi nissayavārampi saṁsaṭṭhavārampi sampayuttavārampi pañhāvārampi vitthāretabbaṁ.)
analyzed: sahajāta vārampi paccaya vārampi nissaya vārampi sa saṭṭha vārampi sampayutta vārampi pañhā vārampi
